attributes.action: Shut down the Daily Mail newspaper, as there is less truth in it than in the Iraq dossier
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Shut down the daily mail newspaper. I used to deliver it on my morning paper round and occasionally had the misfortune of viewing it's contents. It was enough to make anyone want to vote BNP. Please shut it down before people do!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
